channel.title: Magento on SpiderSoft
channel.description: Recent content in Magento on SpiderSoft

item.title: Magento 2.1 installation issues
item.description:
I’ve been recently trying to install the latest Magento and was experiencing some issues with Magento installer unable to detect PHP version. My message was pretty weird:

Your PHP version is . The required PHP version is

also found couple 500 errors in XHR requests.

item.description: Some useful function for managing attribute values in Magento.

item.title: More about product attributes in Magento
item.description: Last time I mentioned Magento attributes, how to create them from model. Ok – but examples was quite simple. This time a little more explanation.

item.title: Magento manage attributes from model
item.description: You can create and remove Magento product attributes from model. It’s quite simple if you know how.
